section.title: Installation and default configuration
section.p: Starting with blojsom 1.4, an XML-RPC servlet is included with blojsom that provides support for the Blogger API and the MetaWeblog API.
Edit the contents of /WEB-INF/authorization.properties to setup all the valid username/password pairs to control who can post via XML-RPC. And you're done ;)
To send a message to the service, point your blogger tool or XML-RPC client at your http://www.your.blog.com/xmlrpc
Replace www.your.blog.com with the url for your blog and get blogging!

section.title: Writing a custom XML-RPC handler
section.p: If you are writing a custom XML-RPC handler for blojsom, you must write your class to implement the AbstractBlojsomAPIHandler interface. Take a look at the source code for the BloggerAPIHandler and the MetaWeblogAPIHandler to see how it's done.

section.title: Registering a custom XML-RPC handler
